entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
